website_summaries.verdict: If you’ve got a permanent site, it’s a versatile solution for your garage or utility area.
pros: Unusual but efficient wall-mounted unit brings warm air down to your boots, shoes, and gloves, so it requires less floor space than many
Has two heat settings and a timer function that will run up to 3 hours
cons: A few owners report issues with timer and motor durability

customer_reviews.title: ... drier out of PVC pipes and fittings - works pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them and made a 4 pairs of boots and helmets drier out of PVC pipes and fittings - works pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WarrantyService?????
customer_reviews.text: Timer will not count down and turn off the drier. Opened my Warranty information that directs me to warrantyservice1688@yahoo.com. What a joke. Doesn't seem to be a valid way to contact anyone. Thing drys shoes just fine, so either I will set a timer to activate myself to go turn it off, or see if I can set up and Alexa Smart plug to control it. With no warranty service I do not recomment buying one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best boot dryer I've ever used or seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the best boot dryer I've ever used or seen. Produces a strong flow of hot air capable of quickly drying boots or gloves. Uses about 450w on high and 300w on low. Unfortunately out of the box it does not have a setting to run the fan only without the heater. If you're handy with circuits and a soldering iron you can easily modify it so you can run it with the fan only (60w). HIGHLY recommend this dryer. I will update this again in a couple months as I use this every day to dry my work boots.
customer_reviews.author: C. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Helps you take care of your stuff . . .
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made boot and glove dryer. One answered question said it needs to be wall mounted but it does not. I have it wall mounted but it's very easy to take off the wall, it can be tossed in bag for travel and will operate perfectly on a floor, table or other flat surface. I also like that the timer can be set to run for a long time insuring full drying or pre-wear warming. Highly recommend seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: Hipster Doofus

customer_reviews.title: Dry boots and mittens quickly
customer_reviews.text: Generally works well for boots, mittens and other items. Its a little cumbersome to mount it so we just use it on the floor. There seems to be some small part that's come loose inside as there's a quiet rattling sound when its in use. Otherwise, it works well and dries items quickly (about an hour for most things) without too much heat. The kids love having dry boots and mittens in the mornings! Or, they use it to quickly warm things up before heading outside.
customer_reviews.author: Hemingway's Dog

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product.  Vercitile.  Doesn't have to be wall mounted.  Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it was like a product owned by a friend. That dryer was wall mounted. Worked better than any other boot dryer I had tried. This product is even better. Has a glove dryer attachment. Has variable heat settings. Because I rent the places I stay during the ski season t is unlikely I will wall mount this device. I will use it on the floor or temporarily hang it from something. I tested it for floor use and there are no issues. This is the best boot dryer I have encountered among the wide variety friends and I have used, and it is priced very competitively.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: About as loud as a bathroon fan
customer_reviews.text: We put this in a room that we will not be in while it is in use. When mounting it to the wall make sure you add enough room for taller boots so the hoses don't rest on the insole thus not allowing air flow. The selector for one or two pairs of gloves is handy for keeping up the air flow into the boots. Also it adds a little heat to speed up the drying process, But not enough to melt any winter gear.
customer_reviews.author: D Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I have three children who love the snow, so having a multi-port dryer is so great to get their snow stuff dry quickly, rather than letting it sit on the heating vent over night and hoping it is dry by morning. One thing I didn't notice when I was looking to buy the product is that it mounts right on the wall! I wish I would have had an outlet in my mudroom closet, since it plugs into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Alisia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use. A must for winter weather.
customer_reviews.text: We live in MN and our winters here last a very long time. This is great for keeping not only kids stuff dry but also my husbands work boots after a long days work. Easy, to assemble and use. Only wish the tubes could be stored easier. If you set this on the counter top you will need a chair to put the boots on as the tubes are not long enough to reach the floor. Otherwise you can hang it from a wall. We chose not to do that option as I didn’t want it always out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service. Great dryer.
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great so far this season. We've had lots of snow and it works quickly and efficiently to dry our boots and gloves. It's nice that is can be set for heated air or just air. The timer has been working great. We liked that it could be mounted to the wall so it doesn't take up a lot of space. When we received it the wall mount was defective but I contacted the seller through Amazon and they very quickly sent out a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: His Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty damn good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned any other boot dryers before so I can't compare them. I bought this one because I figured I would like the hoses instead of the stationary pipes. Honestly, once I figured out the right mount height, the damn thing worked great. I have ran it every night all night, every single day and sometimes it would run all weekend because I would forget to turn it off. It's been a little over 2 years and it just now broke down on me. I'm about to order another one and hope I get the same amount of usage out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! I used to put my kids' gloves on the heat vents every day after school so they were dry and warm in the morning, but since we got a puppy he's chewed up at least 3 pairs! I set this up in the basement (where the dog can't go) and live that it mounts in the wall! Works well, has a timer/auto shut-off. The only problem I can see will be when my 3 year old starts school and I have more gloves to dry overnight, but I'll just have to remember to switch them out like clothes in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: jen_jupiter

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I ever imagined
customer_reviews.text: This dried 2 pairs of totally water logged boots in 1 night. Not noisy at all. I slept while it ran in the master bath room. Surprisingly, they even smelled ok! LOL! This will save me many many pairs of shoes and boots from being destroyed by moisture. Excellent Value. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Wakia

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!  Toxic smelling even after running 10+ hours of usage
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped to use this to dry cleats and ski gear inside my house. However, there's no way anybody would be able to stand the toxic plastic smell emitted by this device if it were used inside. Using it outside in winter sort of defeats the purpose so I've returned it; only my 3rd return after many hundreds of Amazon orders. I'm surprised this fatal flaw isn't mentioned in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Saxer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect on boots hats and gloves. For wet insoles only takes about 45 mins to dry, the whole boot soaking wet took longer as to be expected. Great for warming boots up that were left in the car overnight. Didn't hang in on the wall, left it in the bottom of the closet and took it out when needed.
customer_reviews.author: SMILLAR

customer_reviews.title: Missing gloves attachment
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 units, only one box had the gloves attachment. Not sure if I got someone's return or what happened. That was the reason I purchased this model, so I can dry my kids gloves and boots. Unit works well, moves quite a bit of air and boots seem to dry quickly. I'd give 5 stars if I got all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: A Mials

customer_reviews.title: Drys CPAP Tubes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dry my husband’s CPAP tubes. The tubes fit perfectly in each slot. I can set the timer for 180 minutes and they are done. The tubes never get too hot with the constant warm heat blowing. If I ever need to use this for footwear or gloves, I know it will work great.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Canoe

customer_reviews.title: Low profile, less intrusive
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gentle heat. Super easy to live with thanks to the wall mount. Fits in our narrow hallway. Select 1 or 2 pairs of gloves to dry, thanks to shutoff dials. About as loud as a bathroom fan. The wall mount is the real killer app for this thing. High quality feel.
customer_reviews.author: MNBska

customer_reviews.title: Works but has a couple of drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: I'd go 3.5 stars if there were such a thing. No shut-off on the tubes that are not in use is really a drawback. It does dry well and the timer is nice. Definitely has a plastic smell but no problem for us as it is in a mudroom. Not too noisy. We felt it really needed to be wall mounted but this was easy to do. We do use it a lot and it does work.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe dryer; I love how it mounts on the wall out of the way
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe dryer/ glove dryer. It mounts on the wall out of the way and the hoses go into the shoe or boot instead of the boot going on top of the dryer which then has a tendency to tip over with heavy or tall boots. you can dry boots and gloves or socks at the same time. It does have two heat output settings. It is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: anderberg

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: Used it only a couple of times already to dry shoes. Worked like I thought it would. Very quiet. I am still not sure how to install it. I like to keep it mobile, but I also like installing a wall when I decide where. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: A life saver.
customer_reviews.text: How on earth did I live without one of these before? We are a busy winter loving family. I can dry ski boots, regular boots, gloves, hats etc. I rarely need any longer than 30 minutes for a pair of ski boots. The auto shut off gives me peace of mind that I won’t melt another ski boot dryer like I did with my last one. My favorite part is that I can line up my kids ski boot bags and just stick the hoses in the boots. I don’t have to wrestle all those ski boots out to dry them. It’s a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: PickyMamma

customer_reviews.title: Quit after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: this worked amazingly... for three whole months. Now it makes a terrible screeching sound and won’t run. I expected it to work longer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the versatility, portability, and price
customer_reviews.text: Drys pretty much anything you put on the other end of the tubes. The glove extension/base comes in handy too. It's not super loud, but you can definitely hear it if it's in the same room as you. It's not heavy and is a little larger than I expected, but I was able to get it in my suitcase on our trip to Whistler.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hartman

customer_reviews.title: does the job okay, not much heat and timer is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: You have to take into account how much this cost. The timer is not very accurate but your not cooking with this thing! It does a decent job of drying boots and/gloves but would benefit from a bit more heat production.
customer_reviews.author: DIY User

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids’ stinky soccer cleats. It has really helped and the shoes don’t stink anymore. I installed it in my garage and can turn it on for 30min to 2 hours and walk away. I haven’t taken the glove dryer out of the box yet, so i don’t know how well that works.
customer_reviews.author: Albeamy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'd change on this is it would be nice to have end caps - to cap off the unused hoses. But otherwise it works great. We use it for our daughter's soccer cleats and goalie gloves. Both were getting wet with our Oregon weather, and staying wet between use. They were getting nasty and stinky - like vinegar. Couldn't take it anymore. So far this has reduced the stink and gave them a chance to dry out. I cut up dryer sheets into 1/8's and put a piece in each shoe and glove before putting the hoses in. Not only dries them out, but makes them smell good. Win, win.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C

customer_reviews.title: An upgrade from average
customer_reviews.text: Drying Commercial fishing gear all winter has given this thing a run for it’s money strong air stream for the waders & convenient hoot to hang on the wall out of the way unlike other bulky boot dryers I have had in the past giving 4 stars because I wish the tunes were longer ,& only been a few months so we’ll see how it hold up
customer_reviews.author: Gossip Girl

customer_reviews.title: universal use boot, shoe, glove dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Fits any shoes, boots, or gloves. Not as simple to turn off etc, for my husband, as his basic one, but overall better, i think. Drys well, easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Meeeeeeeeeew

customer_reviews.title: No more smelly damp boots!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are always playing in the snow and come in with wet boots and gloves, so I bought this to make sure we could quickly dry their gear. It works wonderfully! I was able to wall-mount it using Command strips (instead of permanently using the screws included) The timer ensures I don't leave it on forever and the gear is dried in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan U.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to mount on the wall
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to mount on the wall, though you must be sure it is greater than 50 cm from anything on either side, floor and ceiling. I had originally wanted a free-standing one for portability but I am happy with how it performs. I can dry my ski boots and two pairs of gloves/mittens in about 90 minutes. It would be nice to have a cool air setting instead of just low and high heat.
customer_reviews.author: DRH

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: I have kids that are constantly playing sports and come back with wet shoes. We all know they start to stink when they get wet. I purchased this dryer in hopes to dry out the shoes quickly. When turning on the dryer, I thought the air flow was a little on the light side but the shoes and socks dried quickly. I like the glove/sock dryer. I have yet to mount the dryer on the wall but have been impressed with the unit after the one use.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Spirk

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.text: WE have used this thing basically every day since we bought this like 2 years ago. Such a great investment and pretty cheap too! Great to have here in Northern Michigan and I highly recommend. It looks nice on the wall and the glove attachment is so nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Zingg

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t survive winter without this !
customer_reviews.text: My husband works contrasting and gets cold wet feet in the winter and his shoes would never dry in time for work and we got this super easy to install and dried his shoes in time for work ! When he gets home he puts the shoes on it right away !:)
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Yeah! Dry gloves and warm boots!
customer_reviews.text: We ski regularly and sometimes our heavy ski gloves never seem to quite dry out. No more - a quick cycle on the dryer and they are ready to go. Also, it is nice to give the ski boots a blast of warm air before heading to the slopes.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this grandson does landscape work,when he comes home he has to vacuum his boots and put them on dryer if it rains which living in Florida. It storms almost daily you dry then vacuum . Landscapers. Look after a ten hour day like they have been playing in and adult sand box!👞🌴🌻
customer_reviews.author: C. CROTTS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this to dry my hockey skates and gloves after every game. I love it and it works quickly! THe tenicals allow you to dry anything than it mounts to the wall to be out of the way and can still be grabbed and taken on the go
customer_reviews.author: Adam Blough

customer_reviews.title: This sits in our garage and dries soccer cleats. ...
customer_reviews.text: This sits in our garage and dries soccer cleats. What a difference! Works well and keeps the cleats from staying damp from practice to practice which makes them a little less smelly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, dry ski boots
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I bring it in my checked luggage when I go on ski trips. I turn it on in the morning when get up and by the time I’m ready to ski, my boots are dry and warm. Much easier to put on the boots.
customer_reviews.author: R * H

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a few months now and it works very well. I can even wash my shoes at work and they will be ready to go completely dry BEFORE I go home!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as a Christmas gift, he is an avid outdoorsman. He has used the boot/glove dryer several times and loves it. It works quickly and efficiently. Does a great job of drying boots and gloves !
customer_reviews.author: The Edward

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and is much more versatile than the traditional ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and is much more versatile than the traditional boot tower. I've even used it to dry out a dome tent after we got rained out of camp. just draped two of the hoses into the fly and let it go a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best boot dryer I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I spend 12+ hours a day in Logger voots that get sweaty and wet. This boot dryer keeps them fresh and dry. I use it daily and have never experienced a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dry boots and gloves pretty quick. We use them on ski trips
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. Dry boots and gloves pretty quick. We use them on ski trips, take them into the hotel room, put them on low and let them dry overnight. I also have a power inverter in our van, we use it when we're taking breaks or eating lunch. Dries gloves in under an hour. We just rotate pairs of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made! My grandsons snow boots & gloves dry out very quickly (sometimes an hour) with this.. Main purpose for buying was for muck boots that got left out on the porch in rain. They do dry in a couple of hours with this dryer. Wish I'd had a couple of them when my kids were small.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget
customer_reviews.text: This boot/glove dryer is hanging on our wall for all to use.. it’s very useful & keeps snow boots, tennis shoes & gloves/ mittens nice & dry! Very easy to install..I did it myself!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design.
customer_reviews.text: I can Dry the sweat out of my tall muck boots and 2 pairs of gloves in about an hour every night. It makes a little noise so it is best if you have a location where it wont disturb you for an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Dude, Kendal RULES..
customer_reviews.text: Dude, Kendal RULES.. I put in 60 days skiing this year, used Kendal after every use on gloves, boots, bibs. If you work or play daily and your junk gets wet, don't let it get gross or we can't be friends.
customer_reviews.author: monad

customer_reviews.title: Wet boots? Not anymore
customer_reviews.text: If you want dry warm boots look no further. Set the timer and walk away! Does gloves too. I put mine in a corner, laundry room outta the way. Only regret is I waited so long to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: quality and performance were as expected, would buy again, would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It dries my fiancé’s boots daily. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: April Teche

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Has been a life saver this winter. My kids come home with their gloves and boots are soaked.. Put this on for an hour, or sometimes 90 mins and they're all dry and ready to go. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: JStandland1

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use, easy to set up, and dries items well. Only thing I wish is that you could block off some of the hoses when you only have two items to dry, but can still make it work.
customer_reviews.author: myname

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer, don't leave it on for days at a time like I did
customer_reviews.text: Works great, unfortunately fan motor burned out after 5 months. Probably my fault, left it on for long periods, just ordered a new one, wont be using it without the timer from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Cockcroft

customer_reviews.title: This product works really well. We have a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well. We have a couple of children in sports and their cleats smell awful after practice and games. We placed the device in our garage and they put their cleats on it when the get home. We run the device and it helps tremendously with the smell.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sid

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it was blowing enough hot air through the tubes but if you stick the tubes all the way to the toes of your soaking wet shoes or boots, they will dry. Usually I set the timer for 120 minutes to dry tennis shoes that have been submerged in our lagoon. I have not tried them on gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Garfunkal

customer_reviews.title: NIce Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a ski rental and have received very positive feedback from our guests.
customer_reviews.author: jfillion

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: works great, the timer is a good feature. Not sure about the glove attachment set up (hence the 4 stars)
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super product for wet shoes and gloves! My son pays soccer as goalie. This was a lifesaver for his equipment. Eliminated moisture and stopped any bacteria from forming.
customer_reviews.author: TKO4JESUS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy versatile
customer_reviews.text: Works great very versatile a little louder than I’d like but that’s ok
customer_reviews.author: Justin hutto

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I use this to dry my boxing gloves and gear 4 times a week. It has them dry in 3o minutes. I've had it for about 8 months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puts out sufficient heated air and I use daily during ...
customer_reviews.text: Puts out sufficient heated air and I use daily during ski season. Would prefer more flexible hoses to slip into the toes of my ski boots
customer_reviews.author: F. J. Backer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So far all good. Lived up to my expectations at this point. Only used for ski boots. Good flow and hot air but not too hot. Just right for my U14 kids race boots. At least they will have dry boots and i don’t have to worry about cold feet now. Definitely recommend for the price. Noise is acceptable if not in the same room.
customer_reviews.author: David Hall

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This boot dryer is amazing. The glove attachment works great to dry wet gloves quickly. It has a timer so you don’t have to worry about turning it off.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Koldeway

customer_reviews.title: Over all a good product
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. The hose connections and attachments do not stay connected. The hoses and attachments are always falling off.
customer_reviews.author: DONNIE MARSHBURN

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again in a heart beat
customer_reviews.text: Best money I ever spent... thinking about getting another one because the wife keeps stealing it mer the couch to warm her spot.
customer_reviews.author: Sexy yeti

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this, with two boys playing lots of soccer we never have wet smelly cleats for the next day. Wish I bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but very good
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY way to properly dry your boots / shoes / gloves. Lots of air flow and 350W power makes it warm enough to do the job in 1hr. A bit more costly than the other 15W models but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar E.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made Had to shake it to engage the motor and when it finally did start blowing the hoses are not a functional way to insert into shoes Currently does not work and headed to trash
customer_reviews.author: tanner k

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out product
customer_reviews.text: Received product in time frame promised. Product looks to be well thought out and made. Although haven't actually used it yet to dry boots, did hook it up and test the fan/heat....just about right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after only 9 uses. Ridiculous price for a terrible product. Find something else to buy unless you like to throw your money away.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: For 220volt
customer_reviews.text: For 220 volts I replaced the motor with "Yj58 220v" and plug. If necessary, turn the motor anchor for the direction of rotation in Yj58.
customer_reviews.author: Oleksandr Pavlenko

customer_reviews.title: the square thing you hook up the pegs to that the hoses go in is missing.
customer_reviews.text: the square thing you hook up the pegs to that the hoses go in is missing. pls send to change review.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl r.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and love the 2 speed fan
customer_reviews.text: Works great and love the 2 speed fan, use it for hockey gloves and skates to keep them from getting crusty and smelly
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Niber

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I use it to dry out my boots and I use it to warm up my footwear before I put them on. It's winter, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Vega

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, consistent, easily forgotten noise. Can set a timer or leave on. I love the glove dryer. Can set to dry only 1 pair if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Crustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great little drier!
customer_reviews.text: Dries shes and gloves fast. I mounded it on the wall in my laundry room. It is very compact and quiet. Love it and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: marina

customer_reviews.title: Not bad being one of the least expensive
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, good concept I think, good for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, the multiple hoses let me dry a variety of things.
customer_reviews.author: MN Haider

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Not too loud.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Works for a n ironworker that comes home with wet boots often especially in the winter and spring.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it prewinter season. My husband said it dried his shoes and gloves very good and likes the timer.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha

customer_reviews.title: Totally happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Totally happy with this product. Does a fine job of drying my gloves and ski boots after a morning backcountry tour.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: great for boys wet boots all winter
customer_reviews.text: does the job! great for boys wet boots all winter!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Young

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We took it with us on our ski trip and it saved our bottoms because it was a wet weekend. I am looking forward to installing it on the wall next season. I really liked the timer feature. I always forget my Peet dryers are on. Recommend it and love the Prime shipping it was here in a jiffy.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has worked GREAT so far this winter. Awesome product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sam's_mom

customer_reviews.title: Crowd Pleaser
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awsome! Just got back from elk hunting in Colorado and everybody wanted to use our dryer instead of their standups.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Wall base keeps it out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wall base keeps it out of the way. Dried my shoes and boots. Really keeps them fresh

customer_reviews.title: Best investment. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have highly recommended this to other people.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile and wall mount capable! I want another one but they are unavailable! Note: strong odor on initial use as heating elements warm up.

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.text: been using it for over a month now just about every night. Love the timer feature. Dries boots effectively.

customer_reviews.text: pretty cool unit and great for ski boots and wet motocross boots

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very quiet. No need to buy an expensive boot dyer if you can hook these babies up to some pvc pipe for ski boots and gloves. It’s also great for drying wet work boots.

customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase 😊 It will be a great addition to the winter and wet weather 😊

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my use. Wish the hoses were ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my use. Wish the hoses were longer so I could mount the unit in a more convenient location.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mahr

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Works so well! Not loud at all and really dries your shoes fast! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: but like others have stated
customer_reviews.text: I took it out of the box and set it up. It does blow out warm air, but like others have stated, it is pretty weak. When you hook up the glove dryer it's really difficult to tell that there's any air coming out of it. Not sure how well it's going to do on wet gloves and boots, but I'll update my review once I have the opportunity to truly test it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

product_meta.title: Kendal Shoes Boots Gloves Dryer SI-SD06G
feature_bullets: Warm air dryer for shoes, boots, gloves, pants, and more in about half an hour, you can go back to wearing them again shortly.
The shoe dryer can dry 2 pairs of shoes at the same time; the glove dryer can dry 2 pairs of gloves at the same time.
Warm air protects clothes. Aroma active carbon is used to absorb odor and make your shoes smell better.

With a up to 3 hours timer. Low and High temperature mode can be selected. Weighing in at 3.5 pounds, this machine will take up very little space on your next outdoor trip or as a permanent fixture at your home.
Include wall-mount kits if you want to mount it on the wall. CE certified. AC 110-120V, 60 Hz, 325 Watts.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars196 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
